programme.title: Holiday Touchdown: A Chiefs Love Story
programme.desc: Chiefs superfan Alana tries to win the Fan of the Year Award as a Christmas gift for her family, falling in love with someone in the Chiefs front office along the way.

programme.title: Christmas on Call
programme.desc: The lives of First Responders in Philadelphia intersect over the holiday season while juggling work, personal lives and their dedication to protect and serve their city.

programme.title: Holiday Mismatch
programme.desc: New retiree Barb joins a Holiday Committee but clashes with long standing member Kath. When they realize their kids have started dating, they conspire to break up the happy couple.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche's love life is the basis for her sister's romantic novel.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy sees an old flame; Blanche and Sophia fall prey to con artists.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche supplies a date for wedding-bound Dorothy; Sophia puts a curse on the newlyweds.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche's love life is the basis for her sister's romantic novel.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy sees an old flame; Blanche and Sophia fall prey to con artists.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche supplies a date for wedding-bound Dorothy; Sophia puts a curse on the newlyweds.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: In order to get a syndication deal, Frasier has to help his agent, Bebe, quit smoking.

programme.title: The Town Christmas Forgot
programme.desc: A stranded family (Lauren Holly, Rick Roberts) helps residents of a small town organize a Christmas pageant.

programme.title: Once Upon a Holiday
programme.desc: When a royal princess runs away from her official obligations and duties, she starts to fall in love with a good Samaritan who is unaware of her real identity.

programme.title: Holiday Hotline
programme.desc: After leaving London, Abby works for a cooking hotline and connects with an anonymous caller, a single father who Abby is unknowingly smitten with in real life.

programme.title: Christmas at the Plaza
programme.desc: When historian Jessica is hired to create the Plaza's Christmas display, she finds more than facts while teaming up with handsome decorator Nick to bring the display to life.

programme.title: Never Kiss a Man in a Christmas Sweater
programme.desc: A single mom faces Christmas alone until a stranger crashes into her life and becomes an unexpected houseguest.

programme.title: It's Christmas, Eve
programme.desc: A school superintendent with a knack for turning around schools meets a single father who works as the head of the school's bankrupt music department. As she rediscovers her passion for music, she works to save the dreams of the kids who love music.

programme.title: Deck the Walls
programme.desc: Interior designer, Rose DeMonte, uses her skills back in her hometown to renovate a Christmas Charity Home for her brother Sal and his contractor Brysen's home flipping company.

programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Tina's Miracle
programme.desc: Successful gift-wrapping shop owner Tina is in charge of planning this year's annual Christmas gala. But things begin to go awry when the gala faces cancellation due to a scrooge-like estate owner.

programme.title: The Santa Summit
programme.desc: At a Santa-themed holiday event, three teachers get their groove back, strengthen their friendship and unexpectedly find love along the way.

programme.title: Trivia at St. Nick's
programme.desc: Locals compete in a Christmas bar trivia tournament at the end of the semester.

programme.title: Happy Howlidays
programme.desc: Mia, a meticulous webpage editor for the Seattle Tourism Board, finds herself unexpectedly navigating the holidays alone. As the only one working, she's drawn into an unusual encounter when she encounters a stray dog.

programme.title: Christmas on Cherry Lane
programme.desc: Three families celebrate Christmas at turning points in their lives.

programme.title: Silver Bells
programme.desc: A teenage runaway (Michael Mitchell) connects his widowed father (Tate Donovan) and a woman (Anne Heche) who lost her husband during a past Christmas holiday.

programme.title: November Christmas
programme.desc: A community works together to help a couple bring an early Christmas to their sick 8-year-old daughter (Emily Alyn Lind).

programme.title: Flipping for Christmas
programme.desc: It's almost Christmas when busy realtor Abigail agrees to help her sister with the simple flip of a recently inherited home. Unfortunately, co-beneficiary Bo has other plans in mind.

programme.title: A Royal Queens Christmas
programme.desc: A prince makes his way to Queens, N.Y., when a local woman enlists his help for a children's Christmas show.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: 'Twas the Date Before Christmas
programme.desc: Feeling the pressure to bring someone home for Christmas, Jessie convinces Bryan to join her family for a day filled with holiday events, only the family doesn't know it's their first date.

programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Tina's Miracle
programme.desc: Successful gift-wrapping shop owner Tina is in charge of planning this year's annual Christmas gala. But things begin to go awry when the gala faces cancellation due to a scrooge-like estate owner.

programme.title: Holidazed
programme.desc: A neighborhood of families rushes home for the holidays, ready to share in the chaos and joy of the season.
